thread.title: Kansas City Chiefs vs. Minnesota Vikings Pick Prediction NFL Pro Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-18-2015
thread.title_full: Kansas City Chiefs vs. Minnesota Vikings Pick Prediction NFL Pro Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-18-2015

author: Tony Tellez
title: Kansas City Chiefs vs. Minnesota Vikings Pick Prediction NFL Pro Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-18-2015
text:
Point Spread Odds: Vikings -4 
Over Under Total: 44 points. 
Money Line: Vikings -200 odds and Chiefs +170 odds 
Notes: Kansas City has lost four straight to fall to 1-4 with the 18-17 home defeat last week to the Chicago Bears as a -10   under 44 points. The Chiefs blew a 17-3 lead at the half. Alex Smith had just 181 yards passing and a touchdown throw. KC is 29th in the NFL in scoring defense by allowing 28.6 points per game. 
Minnesota is 2-2 following the 23-20 road overtime defeat in week four to the Denver Broncos as a +7 point wagering underdog. The total went under 43 Â½ points. The Vikings are coming off the bye week. The team tied the Broncos at 20-20 late and gave up the game winning field goal with under two minutes left. Minnesota did a poor job in pass protection by giving up seven quarterback sacks. Adrian Peterson had 16 carries for 81 yards and a touchdown. The Vikings are sixth in the NFL in scoring defense by allowing 18.2 points per game. 
Kansas City Chiefs versus Minnesota Vikings
